mapper.update: update consumption_type set parent_type_id = #{parentTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_readonly = #{isReadonly,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, use_area = #{useArea,jdbcType=BIT} where type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select type_id, parent_type_id, type_name, owner, group_id, status, is_readonly, create_by, create_time, modifier, modify_time, use_area from consumption_type where type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
